00014 #if ! defined(_Adc_FixedPtrArray_hpp)
00015 #define _Adc_FixedPtrArray_hpp
00016 
00017 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00018 
00022 template<class T> class FixedPtrArray
00023 {
00024     public:
00026         typedef T * PtrT;
00028         FixedPtrArray() : m_ptr_array(0), m_count(0), m_size(0) {};
00030         FixedPtrArray(INT count) : m_count(0), m_size(0) { 
00031             m_ptr_array = new PtrT[count]; 
00032             if(m_ptr_array!=0) {
00033                 m_count = count;
00034                 m_size = count;
00035             }
00036         }
00038         ~FixedPtrArray() { delete[] m_ptr_array; };
00039 
00043         BOOLEAN Resize(INT count, T * pattern) {
00044             if(m_size<count) {
00045                 delete[] m_ptr_array;
00046                 m_ptr_array = new PtrT[count];
00047                 if(m_ptr_array!=0) {
00048                     m_size = count;
00049                 } else {
00050                     m_count = 0;
00051                     m_size = 0;
00052                     return FALSE;
00053                 }
00054             }
00055             m_count = count;
00056             for(INT i=0; i<count; i++) {
00057                 SetPtr(i,pattern);
00058             }
00059             return TRUE;
00060         }
00061 
00062         BOOLEAN Resize(INT count) {
00063             return Resize(count, 0);
00064         }
00065 
00067         void SetPtr(INT idx, PtrT ptr) { m_ptr_array[idx] = ptr; }
00069         PtrT GetPtr(INT idx) const { return m_ptr_array[idx]; }
00070 
00072         void DeletePtrObj(INT idx) const { delete m_ptr_array[idx]; m_ptr_array[idx] = 0; }
00073 
00075         PtrT operator [] (INT idx) const { return m_ptr_array[idx]; }
00076 
00078         PtrT operator [] (INT idx) { return m_ptr_array[idx]; }
00079 
00081         inline INT  GetCount() const { return m_count; }
00082 
00083     private:
00084         PtrT  * m_ptr_array;
00085         INT   m_count;
00086         INT   m_size;
00087 };
00088
